tasks.name: Define the scope
tasks.prompt: Outline the specific aspects of protein binding to be covered in the report.

tasks.name: Review literature
tasks.prompt: Identify and summarize key studies on protein binding mechanisms.

tasks.name: Design report structure
tasks.prompt: Sketch the report outline including sections like introduction, methodology, results, and conclusion.

tasks.name: Collect and organize data
tasks.prompt: Gather data from literature reviews and other sources on protein binding properties.

tasks.name: Write the report
tasks.prompt: Compose each section of the report with a focus on academic style and clarity.

tasks.name: Edit and proofread
tasks.prompt: Review the report for coherence, accuracy, and adherence to academic writing standards.
